skills.name: Blade Surge
skills.description: Attacks the enemy target 2 times and attacks all enemies with even more powerful attack on the 3rd attack.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Magic Surge
skills.description: Attacks the target that isn't granted with any beneficial effects with 3 magic bullets and Silences the target for 2 turns with a 75% chance each. The target under the Silence Effect won't be able to use skills with cooldown time excluding the passive skills.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Silence
skill_effect.description: Skills with cooltime are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Sweet Revenge(Passive)
skills.description: Removes 1 beneficial effect each with a 35% chance and recovers the ally with the lowest HP by 15% when you attack on your turn. [Automatic Effect]
skills.level_progress_description:
Recovery +10%
Recovery +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Recovery +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)
